def turn(state):
    # Follow up question.
    results = []
    for x, in get1idxs(idxs):
        check_x_smallest = smallest([x], ctx) == x
        check_x_medium_gray = is_grey(x, ctx) and not is_light(x, ctx) and not is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_x_medium_gray_compared = all([is_lighter(x, dot, ctx) or is_same_color(x, dot, ctx) for dot in idxs if dot != x])
        if (
            check_x_smallest
            and check_x_medium_gray
            and check_x_medium_gray_compared
        ):
            results.append([x])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def turn(state):
    # No op.
    return state
state = turn(state)

def select(state):
    # Select a dot.
    results = []
    for x, in get1idxs(idxs):
        check_x_medium_size = is_medium_size(x, ctx)
        check_x_light = is_light(x, ctx)
        check_x_not_top_left = x != get_top_left(idxs, ctx)
        if (
            check_x_medium_size
            and check_x_light
            and check_x_not_top_left
        ):
            results.append([x])
    return results
state = select(state)
